text:
@JoeBiden #DementiaJoe adviser, Dr Zeke Emanuel, 01.29.20:

-Coronavirus is very unlikely to be severe
-Refers to Admin's response as "histrionic"
-Compares virus to the flu
-Chance of getting it is low
-Blames China
-Hard to figure out what the right measure is
#WalkAway #CreepyJoe
